name: com.liltoon.pcss-extension
description: 沁ｯ Professional PCSS (Percentage-Closer Soft Shadows) extension for lilToon and Poiyomi shaders with Avatar Selector Menu. Features Unity 2022.3 LTS compatibility, URP 14.0.10 support, built-in preset system (Realistic/Anime/Cinematic), one-click avatar setup with ModularAvatar integration, Base layer red face light implementation, official support for Unity Editor Coroutines (com.unity.editor-coroutines), automatic material remapping on FBX/model import, and new: MissingMaterialAutoFixer Editor extension & FBX/Prefab auto-remap for missing materials.
